```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}
# Create a vector! 
vec_a <- c(4, 5)

```


## ANOTHER CODE CHUNK

```{r, echo = FALSE}
vec_b <- c(-3, 10)
```

## Vector addition: 

```{r}
# Create a new vector vec_c that is the sum of vec_a and vec_b

vec_c <- vec_a + vec_b
```

## Vector subtraction: 

```{r}
# vec_d is vec_b - vec_a

vec_d <- vec_b - vec_a
```


## Vector scalar multiplier: 
```{r}
# what is vec_e if it is 4 * vec_b
vec_e <- 4 * vec_b
```

## If we use asterisk: 

```{r}
vec_a * vec_b

vec_a %*% vec_b
```
